SYSTEM: Ontologies%26Multilinguality.pdf: Página 12
©Guadalupe Aguado de Cea
12
2. OLA at the Conceptual layer
•
Advantages: 
•
Conceptualizations are maintained in each language
•
Suitable for ontologies highly dependent of a certain culture: the judiciary.
• Disadvantages: 
• Huge effort needed to conceptualize the same domain in different natural languages. 
• Three types of expertise are required: domain expertise, linguistic expertise, and 
ontology engineering expertise.
speaker: SYSTEM
